user.about: There is no end and no beginning, because there is light in the darkness and it renews all things. Life and death are not serious alternatives. We derive from and merge into the light through eternity, so there is no end to us and no beginning.

additional_info:
Anyone capable of reading can obtain information ten times faster by doing so than watching a video. If you agree, then I recommend installing the add-on NoScript in Firefox, which should be everyone's browser, to disable CNN's auto-play of videos. If you don't use Firefox and NoScript, then good luck with your future malware infection.

***To eliminate CNN's crappy ways, forbid all scripts except for cnn.com and postrelease.com

The end result will be transforming CNN into a halfway tolerable web site.
